subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The British star Mark Cavendish won his second Giro d’Italia stage in three days, while Alberto Contador retained his overall lead of 59 seconds.
snippet: The British star Mark Cavendish won his second Giro d’Italia stage in three days, while Alberto Contador retained his overall lead of 59 seconds.
